room_title: Escape room "The Estate" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: My boyfriend, his parents, our friend, I had ALL of our first escape room experience tonight. We did "The Estate" room and although it was challenging, we made it out with 3 minutes to spare! Definitely coming back another time!

room_title: Escape room "The Estate" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: This place was incredible! We did The Estate and it was an awesome challenge. Very clean and pretty as well, worth the trip!

room_title: Escape room "The Estate" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: We were in the Morgantown WV area and came across the opportunity to play an Escape game. We played the Estate game. We found the loot but had one last clue to figure out how to release the booty. Even though we didn't win we still had a blast. The owners were super nice. We would recommend it to anyone who loves to solve a good mystery.

room_title: Escape room "The Estate" by Xscape! Live Escape Games in Morgantown
review: Fantastic experience the whole way through. Would definitely return to do the new room when it opens, especially after being extremely pleased with THE ESTATE. I could not recommend this place more!
